title: "Job Applicant Resumes Are Effectively Impossible to De-Gender, AI Researchers Find"
excerpt: "Researchers from New York University have found that even very simple Natural Language Processing (NLP) models are quite capable of determining the gender of a job applicant from a ‘gender-stripped’ résumé – even in cases where machine learning methods have been used to remove all gender indicators from the document."
